doNotHaveAccountYet: Do not have an account yet?
signUpToAcceptInvite: Please sign in/up to accept the invite
clickToAcceptAs: Click the button below to accept the invite with as {{email}}
acceptInviteWithDifferentAccount: Want to accept the invite with a different account?
alreadyHaveAccountStatement: I already have an account, I want to sign in instead
doNotHaveAccountStatement: I do not have an account, I want to sign up instead
addingToOrganization: We are adding you to {{name}}. Please Wait...
passwordResetSubheading: Enter your email address below. You will receive a link to reset your password.
passwordResetSuccessMessage: Check your Inbox! We emailed you a link for resetting your Password.

errors.auth/user-disabled: Your account has been disabled. Please contact Support.
errors.auth/too-many-requests: You have exceeded the number of allowed attempts. Please try again later.
errors.auth/network-request-failed: The request failed due to a network error. Please try again.
errors.auth/account-exists-with-different-crede: The account already exists with a different credential
errors.auth/credential-already-in-use: This credential is already in use. Please try with another one.
errors.auth/email-already-in-use: This email is already in use. Please try with another one
errors.auth/cancelled-popup-request: The request was cancelled. Please try again.
errors.default: Email or Password are invalid. Please try again
